alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 9:55AM EST until January 26 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulations up to a third of an inch, with the highest totals across the southern Green Mountains of southern Vermont. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In Vermont, Bennington and Windham Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ice accretion will be mainly limited to elevations above 1500 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages.
